segments.text: I think I need some iced water , too . Is there an extra charge for that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . We charge 50 cents for iced water .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's fine . Could you give me some more napkins , too ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . Do you need anything else ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . I would also like some sweet-and-sour sauce and pepper .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll put all that into the bag for you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do I owe you for the sauce , pepper and napkins ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , there's no charge for those .
segments.speaker: S2
